article:
Notable software MIDI editors and sequencers are listed in the following table.

{| class="wikitable sortable"

! Software !! Platform !! License !! Developer !!class="unsortable"| Notes

|software || Willow Software || - Aria Maestosa || Linux, Mac OS, Windows || GNU
|GPL || [http://ariamaestosa.sourceforge.net/ Aria (SourceForge)] ||Supports
|extended MIDI automation (volume, pitch bend, modulation, etc.), can view/edit
|notes in linear midi view or musical view (sheet-like), automatic or manual

|and [http://ardour.org/credits The Ardour Community] || MIDI support began with

||| Export only - [http://harmonyseq.wordpress.com/ harmonySEQ] || Linux || GNU
|GPL || Open Source, managed by Rafal Cieslak || Customizable set of
|synchronized MIDI sequencers, each repeating short sequence, designed to aid
|with music composing and live performances, acts as automatic accompanist or
|controls an external drumkit. - Indaba Music || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary

||| Programming library (API) - KeyKit || Linux, Windows || Free for non-

|Klee] || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || Defective Records Software ||
|Software step sequencer, modeled after hardware Klee sequencer - Live || Mac
|OS, Windows || Proprietary ||Ableton || - Logic Pro || Mac OS (also
|previously for Windows & Atari ST) || Proprietary ||
|Apple/Emagic(formerly known as C-Lab || - LMMS || Linux, OpenBSD, Windows ||
|GNU GPL || || No support for exporting to MIDI; DAW; VST, LADSPA support. As of
|4/30/2011 no MIDI aftertouch support  - [http://defectiverecords.com/m185
|M185] || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || Defective Records Software ||
|Software step sequencer, modeled after hardware for Roland System 100M - MAGIX
|Samplitude || Windows || Proprietary || MAGIX || - Making Waves || Windows ||
|Proprietary || [http://www.makingwavessoftware.com Making Waves Audio] || Audio
|and MIDI sequencing, Multi Track audio recording, full VST plugin support || -
|Master Tracks Pro || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || GVOX (orig. dev.:
|Passport Designs) || Full-featured GUI MIDI sequencer with notation
|screen (requires supplied Anastasia TrueType or Type1 font) ,
|event editor, MCI, SMPTE sync., etc. Tested to work under Win 7. -
|[http://www.tima.uk.com/midianal.htm Midianal] || Windows || Freeware || T
|Andrews || Suitable for analysing midi files. Import a midifile and export the
|data in CSV format. - MIDI Converter Studio || Windows || Shareware ||
|ManiacTools || MIDI file converter, karaoke converter -
|[http://midieditor.sourceforge.net/ MidiEditor] || Linux, Windows || Unlicensed
|(but sources are available) || || - [http://web.tiscali.it/farello/mp/
|MidiPatterns] || Mac OS || Proprietary || Amedeo Farello || Multitrack, pattern-
|oriented sequencer. - Midisoft Recording Session || Windows || Proprietary ||
|Midisoft || Score editor, MIDI commands editor, player, mixer - Midish ||
|Linux, OpenBSD || BSD || || lightweight MIDI sequencer and filter with shell-
|like interface; can play, record, edit, sync to other audio/MIDI software -
|Midisoft Studio || Windows || Proprietary || Midisoft || Score editor, MIDI
|commands editor, player, mixer. Next generation of "Recording session" -
|Mixcraft || Windows || Proprietary || Acoustica || Audio and MIDI sequencer.
|Support for VSTis, MIDI recording, editing, and playback. -
|Mozart || Windows ||Proprietary||David Webber||Music notation software for
simple tunes to full scores of up to 64 parts.
|-
|MU.LAB || Mac OS, Windows ||Proprietary||MUTOOLS||available in three versions:
free, XT, and UL
|- MusE || Linux || GNU GPL || || - MuseScore || Linux, Mac OS, Windows || GNU
|GPL ||Werner Schweer || Music notation software with full MusicXML support -
|[http://www.frieve.com/english/musicstd/download.html Music studio Frieve] ||
|Windows || Shareware ||Frieve||Plays 1 minute until registered. VST hosting
|pianoroll editor and score. Help button is in Japanese, but has a help file.(If
|it does not work on startup, unpack with 7zip!) - Musink || Windows ||
|Proprietary ||Lee Reid || Music notation freeware with MIDI output, loop, and
|playback functionality - [http://www.notation.com/NotationComposer.php Notation
|Composer] || Windows || Proprietary || Notation Software, Inc. || Music
|notation software with full MIDI sequencing capability; MusicXML export -
|NoteEdit || Linux || GNU GPL || ||Defunct; last stable release Sep. 2006. -
|NoteWorthy Composer || Windows || Proprietary || Noteworthy Software || Can
|import and export MIDI data, but only edit and display it as a musical score. -
|Overture (software) || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || Geniesoft || Notation/tab/piano-
|roll, MIDI/step sequencing, VST/VSTi host - Podium || Windows || Proprietary ||
|Zynewave || - PianoRollComposer || Windows || free || http://jdmcox.com || -
|Pizzicato || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || Arpege Music

|MusicXML compatibility, quality sound bank included - - PriMus || Windows ||

|conversion with [http://wiki.cockos.com/wiki/index.php/TabEditor TabEditor]
|plug - Reason || Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || Propellerhead || - Renoise
||| Linux, Mac OS, Windows || Proprietary || ||Demo version available -
|Rosegarden || Linux || GNU GPL || ||Audio, MIDI sequence, record. Win VST
|support, LADSPA, JACK. - Scala || Linux, Mac OS, Windows || Freeware,
|noncommercial || Manuel Op de Coul || Specializes in tuning; converts ascii
|score file to MIDI - [http://openmidiproject.sourceforge.jp/Sekaiju_en.html
|Sekaiju] || Windows || GNU LGPL || kuzu /
|[http://openmidiproject.sourceforge.jp/index_en.html openmidiproject] || Can
|use track list window, piano roll window, event list window and musical score
|window, and they are printable. All kind of MIDI events including meta event
|and system-exclusive event are editable. Can select Japanese or English
|language. - Seq24 || Linux, Windows || GNU GPL || ||MIDI loops sequencer - [http://ju-
|x.com/sequera Sequera] || Mac OS || Proprietary || Juno Ju-X || Stand-alone
|software step sequencer, with numbers of unique approaches. - Sibelius || Mac
|OS, Windows || Proprietary || Sibelius || Features live scoring of sheet music
|from MIDI input. - [http://speedymidi.sourceforge.net/ Speedy MIDI] || Windows
||| GNU GPL v3 || || - Sonar || Windows || Proprietary || Cakewalk || -
|TuxGuitar || FreeBSD, Linux, Mac OS, Windows (Java-based) || GNU GPL || ||
|Tablature editor - Z-Maestro || Windows || Proprietary || || "Lite" version:
|limited tracks, I/O. -
